contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|Fulton}} '''Fulton''' may refer to: {{TOC right}} == People == <!--Only include persons who are commonly referenced as "Fulton" alone -- others with surname are listed at [[Fulton (surname)]] --> * [[Robert Fulton]] (1765â€“1815), U.S. engineer and inventor, developed the first commercially successful steam-powered ship * [[Fulton (surname)]], including list of people with the surname * [[Fulton Sheen]], Sainthood candidate and American Archbishop and media personality == Places == === Canada === * [[Fulton, Ontario]], a community in West Lincoln, Ontario === United States === * [[Fulton, Alabama]] * [[Fulton, Arkansas]] * [[Fulton, California]] * [[Fulton, Illinois]] * [[Fulton, Indiana]] * [[Fulton, Kansas]] * [[Fulton, Kentucky]] * [[Fulton, Maryland]] * [[Fulton, Michigan (disambiguation)]] * [[Fulton, Minneapolis]], Minnesota * [[Fulton, Mississippi]] * [[Fulton, Missouri]] * [[Fulton, New York (disambiguation)]], * [[Fulton, South Dakota]] * [[Fulton, Texas]] ** [[George W. Fulton Mansion]] * [[Fulton, Tennessee]] * [[Fulton, Wisconsin]], a town * [[Fulton (community), Wisconsin]], an unincorporated community == Other uses == * [[Fulton Financial Corporation]], a financial holding company * [[Fulton surface-to-air recovery system]] * [[Fulton Opera House]] * [[Fulton Homes]], a homebuilder based in Tempe, Arizona specializing in mid-range to high-end homes. == See also == * {{Lookfrom|Fulton}} * {{Intitle|Fulton}} * [[Fulton County (disambiguation)]] * [[Fulton Ferry (disambiguation)]] * [[Fulton Township (disambiguation)]] * Lord Fulton's committee report, a [[Her Majesty's Civil Service#Lord Fulton's committee report|major review of the UK civil service]] {{disambiguation|geo}}
